snippet: They come to Baltimore in summer, bearing instruments, and leaving behind, if only for a week, the lives and careers they chose for one they might have imagined.
lead_paragraph: They come to Baltimore in summer, bearing instruments, and leaving behind, if only for a week, the lives and careers they chose for one they might have imagined.

headline.seo: The ‘Campers’ of the Baltimore Symphony Orchestra
headline.main: Every Chair in This Temporary Orchestra Holds a Story
headline.print_headline: Every Chair in This Temporary Orchestra Holds a Story
